import React from 'react' import styles from "./RandomNewsFeedList.module.css"; function RandomNewsFeedList(props) { return (
    {props.feeds.map((feeds) => (

    {feeds.title}

    {feeds.content}

    Read More

    Source: {feeds.source}

    {feeds.time}

    ))}
) } export default RandomNewsFeedList
